title: Anti-PsychoSwag
desc:
Post 762
- May also play this if HyperSwag or Psycho play a card or if a card that is made by them is played
- Cause any cards played or made by HyperSwag or Psycho that are currently in playersâ€™ hands or the play pile to go to the discard pile
- Afterwards, any player affected by this will draw one card for every card affected
